extendedInfo.description: RV TRIP PLANNER CHECKLISTAre you getting ready to go on a RV camping roadtrip?  Make sure you are prepared with this handy checklist app.  Take a look at everything you will have access to:- Comes pre-populated with over 150 items- Add/Delete Lists- Duplicate Old Lists so you don't have to start over- Add New Tasks- Add New Items- Delete Unwanted Items- Set Alarms to remind yourself of items you still need to dokw: vacation, recreational vehicle, highway, travel, luxury, cross country- Add Notes for more clarification- Set a Priority to items (High, Medium, Low)- Edit the Names of Items- Sort Your Lists Alphabetically or by Priority (Menu Item)

reviews.title: No way to export lists
reviews.comment: Good app until you need to transfer all the lists you worked hard to create to a new phone... No response from developer...Check out List Master Pro... it\'s much better
reviews.author: A Google User
